abstract: Commerce Dept announces inventories of wholesale businesses increased 0.8 percent in November 2014, following 0.6 percent increase in October, largest gain since April.
lead_paragraph: Inventories held by wholesalers increased 0.8 percent in November after a 0.6 percent rise in October, the Commerce Department reported on Friday.
snippet: Inventories held by wholesalers increased 0.8 percent in November after a 0.6 percent rise in October, the Commerce Department reported on Friday.

headline.main: After a Lull, Wholesale Inventories Grow Markedly
headline.print_headline: After a Lull, Wholesale Inventories Grow Markedly
